mapper.update: update CRM_ORDER_GJJSBDJ_DETAIL set ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEGIN_DATE = #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, EMPLOYEE_NUM = #{employeeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where EVENT_ID = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select EVENT_ID, ORDER_ID, BUSINESS_ID, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, EMPLOYEE_NUM from CRM_ORDER_GJJSBDJ_DETAIL
